mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Too Many Times", "Hand in Hand" and "Saturday Night Special" ROUND DANCES "Sweet Tamara" and "Whispering" SPECIAL FEATURES "Invitation to San Diego - 1956", "Oklahoma Truly Throws a Whing-Ding", "Sweet Tamara", "You'll See Us at Asilomar", and "The Caller and Musicians, Chapter 4". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "Square Dance Picture", "The Square of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
